name: The Big Lez Videogame - Choomah Island beta
name_original: The Big Lez Videogame - Choomah Island beta
description:
Here you go, after almost 3 years of work I can finally post a little sneak peak. Hope you guys enjoy it, many hours have been spent in this project. If you have any questions, please email me at luiscox96@gmail.com and I will try to answer all your questions.

Enjoy kants

p.s ye na i forgot to put under controls that you can rotate the camera around lez using the middle mouse button, and also to dodge its SHIFT+Q/E not alt+Q/E, my bad!
